You MUST use the associate functionalities provided by OAS, instead.", "given": ["$..parameters[?(@.in == 'header')].name"], "message": "{{error}} in {{path}} {{value}}", "severity": "error", "then": {"function":"pattern","functionOptions":{"notMatch":"/^(accept|content-type|authorization)$/i"}}, } } }
